Reviews.Title: Good little phone.
Reviews.Author: Leslie T. Center
Reviews.Content: Wanted an inexpensive non-smartphone.  A good phone for the price.  Has two SIM cards and a microSD slot.  Not all singing and dancing but delivers on what it promises.*** UPDATE ***After purchasing and using this phone for a week, I started getting reports from folks on the other end of my calls that there was a loud static/buzz/interference on their end.  Unable to resolve the issue with the vendor, I purchased a second unit here on Amazon, but it exhibited the same problem.  The problem is quite bad to the party on the receiving end.  Based on this issue. I cannot recommend this model.  I have had a BLÜ phone before this one, and I carry a BLÜ phone now, so this is not a condemnation of all BLÜ phones, merely this model.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Mary Collins
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone for our daughter to use while living in Paraguay for 11 months.  According to her, it's working fine and was a good choice at a reasonable price.
